label: AB2_mC6_12_a_i-001
title: Calaverite (AuTe$_{2}$, $C34$) Structure
comments:
This structure was given the $C34$ designation by (Gottfried, 1937).  (Pertlik, 1984) put calverite in \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_mP12_7_2a_4a-001}{space group $Pc$ \#7}. 
 AuTe$_{2}$ can also be found as \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_oP24_28_acd_2c3d-001}{krennerite ($C46$)}. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_mC6_12_a_i-001}{$C34$ Calverite} (this structure), \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_mC6_12_a_i-004}{$\alpha$-HgO2}, and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2_mC6_12_a_i-003}{NiO$_{2}$} have the same AFLOW prototype label, AB2\_mC6\_12\_a\_i. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
